code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CourseList=_ref=>{let{userId}=_ref;const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);console.log(userId);useEffect(()=>{if(userId!=null&&userId!==""){axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/courses?user_id=${userId}`).then(response=>{setCourses(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error fetching data:",error);});}},[userId]);const handlePass=(userId,courseId)=>{axios.post("http://localhost:5000/mark_course_passed",{user_id:userId,course_id:courseId}).then(response=>{console.log(response.data.message);window.location.reload(false);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error arking a course passed.");},[userId]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"courses-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("sec",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"course-name",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"course-ects",children:"ECTS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"course-status",children:"STATUS"})]}),courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course-name",children:course.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course-ects",children:course.ects}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"course-status",children:course.passed?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"status-text",children:"Done"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handlePass(userId,course.id),className:"button-actual",children:"Pass"})})]},course.id))]})]});};export default CourseList;
